listOfOngoingProjects: List of ongoing projects. Get to know the projects we are developing.
iAmAPassionate: I am a passionate software developer with experience in web and mobile development. I love learning new technologies and working on challenging projects.
twoYears: With more than 2 years of experience as a System Engineer. My commitment to excellence drives me to optimize and improve processes. I use my skills and knowledge to contribute to the success of your company. I am always willing to adapt to new technologies and face challenges.
wakaCode: WakaCode, where dreams become code and imagination is the compass that guides us to the unexplored. the compass that guides us towards the unexplored.
AlwaysCode: Always code as if the person who will ultimately maintain your code is a violent psychopath who knows where you live.
theThreeUnexpectedVirtuesOfaProgrammer: The Three Unexpected Virtues of a Programmer
mostOfYouAreFamiliar: Most of you are familiar with the virtues of a programmer. There are three, of course: laziness, impatience, and hubris.
measurementIsTheFirst: Measurement is the first step that leads to control and eventually to improvement. If you can't measure something, you can't understand it. If you can't understand it, you can't control it. If you can't control it, you can't improve it.
debugging: Debugging is twice as hard as writing the code in the first place. Therefore, if you write the code as cleverly as possible, by definition, you are not smart enough to debug it.
